*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, [December] 27, 1831, Advising settlement at Peach Point. Importance of cheerful spirits. Progress of Texas */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="12-27-1831">[Dec] 27. 1831*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*brother */person_mentioned*:*/p*
*p*I recd yours from *location_mentioned*Bells */location_mentioned*and have sent all the letters by *person_mentioned*McKinney*/person_mentioned* that I can find there is but one— *person_mentioned*John */person_mentioned*open'd one which is the invoice of the goods on board the Dart, he will want it to regulate the manifest— The Dart will be here tomorrow, also the Elizabeth and Wildcat— They all left the mouth this morning-—all well and harmoney. *person_mentioned*Hunter */person_mentioned*had best come down I think to attend to the goods, tho I do not know what arrangements he made*/p*
*p*As to settling—I left the whole matter to you from the first—and did not urge you to any one place in particular I wished you to please yourself— I will now give a positive opinion, which is that you go direct and immediately to *location_mentioned*Peach point*/location_mentioned*, or come to this *location_mentioned*place*/location_mentioned*— The idea of a good house for this year must be abandoned, *location_mentioned*log cabbins*/location_mentioned* must do—remove all your stock to *location_mentioned*peach point*/location_mentioned*, make corn there *location_mentioned*in the cane brake*/location_mentioned*—let the work at *location_mentioned*Chocolate*/location_mentioned* go and begin down here at once—and from this time forward make up your mind finally and definitively on the subject—and also keep up your sperits—no low sperits will do in any one as nearly connected to me as you are—it is noticed by others and attributed to the wrong cause*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mrs Holly*/person_mentioned* has gone. *person_mentioned*She */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Henrys wife*/person_mentioned* send their love to *person_mentioned*Emily*/person_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*Mrs. H.*/person_mentioned* is a divine *person_mentioned*woman*/person_mentioned*— she will be a *person_mentioned*neighbor */person_mentioned*at *location_mentioned*peach point,*/location_mentioned* also *person_mentioned*Henry */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Archibald*/person_mentioned*. I mean to make a little world there of my own*/p*
*p*Keep up, my Dr *person_mentioned*brother*/person_mentioned*—keep up your spirits we will be happy when we are all collected at *location_mentioned*Peach point*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*Shall be up soon*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I have now taken it on myself to direct where you ought to settle—think no more about it but go to *location_mentioned*peach point*/location_mentioned* and fix some *location_mentioned*cabbins */location_mentioned*or a *location_mentioned*camp*/location_mentioned*, and let building alone for this year— *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1828">Three years ago*/date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Westall */person_mentioned*began where he is—he had 1 *person_mentioned*negro */person_mentioned*man 1 *person_mentioned*boy */person_mentioned*3 *person_mentioned*women*/person_mentioned*— this year he only makes 80 bales of cotton.*/p*
*/div1*
